{{cpp/experimental/title|swap&lt;small&gt;(std::experimental::observer_ptr)&lt;/small&gt;}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions 2/observer_ptr/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=libfund_ts_2|
template&lt; class W &gt;
void swap( observer_ptr&lt;W&gt;&amp; lhs, observer_ptr&lt;W&gt;&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}

Specializes the {{lc|swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::experimental::observer_ptr}}. Swaps the pointers of {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}}. Calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|{{tt|observer_ptr}}s whose contents to swap}}
{{par end}} 

===Return value===
(none)

===Complexity===
Constant.
